mapper.insert: insert into lms_playlistCheck(studentID, playlistID, classContentID, classID, totalVideo, totalWatched, updateWatched) values (#{studentID}, #{playlistID}, #{classContentID}, #{classID}, #{totalVideo}, #{totalWatched}, #{updateWatched})
mapper.update: update lms_playlistCheck set totalWatched = totalWatched + (select duration from lms_video join lms_videoCheck on lms_video.id = lms_videoCheck.videoID where studentID=#{studentID} AND lms_playlistCheck.playlistID=#{playlistID} AND lms_videoCheck.videoID=#{videoID} AND lms_videoCheck.watched=1 ) where playlistID=#{playlistID} AND classContentID = #{classContentID}
mapper.select: select totalVideo from lms_playlist where lms_playlist.playlistID = #{playlistID}
SELECT * FROM lms_playlistCheck order by id desc
